title: RF Testing Engineer
summary: At Apple, we work every single day to craft products that enrich people’s lives! Do you love working on challenges that no one has solved yet? As a member of our dynamic group, you will have the outstanding and rewarding opportunity to craft upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of Apple’s customers every day! Will you help us design future generations of revolutionary Apple products? The RF HW Design group is seeking for RF testing engineer, who has a strong background in electronic testing, and integrated RF subsystems validation to support our WiFi, Bluetooth, UWB and our emerging technologies. If you are passionate about wireless technologies, want to make an impact, and have the desire to work on groundbreaking technologies, then we are looking for you.
description: As RF testing engineer, you will be working with RF Design engineers on wireless connectivity next-generation products. You will debug, test and validate to ensure our hardware designs meet industry and internal standards. You will be responsible to construct and operate test setups consisting of advanced RF test equipment and evaluation boards.
key_qualifications: 5+ years of proven experience in analog and RF HW testing and validation. Hands-on experience with RF test equipment, such as: SA, VSA, VNA, Signal generator. Knowledge of wireless communication standards, such as WiFi, BT, UWB, NFC. Programming/Scripting: Python. Proven experience in constructing and maintaining test setups. Team player, who can make independent decisions in a field of expertise. Proactive and methodical. Good English reading and writing. PCB assembly, soldering experience - Advantage. mmWave experience - Advantage
